title: Challan sent to court for disposal. What to do next?
selftext:
I had a pending challan from 19th June, 2022.

I  tried paying it off online once but payment didn't got successful,  after that Pay button was disabled for 2-3 days (shitty govt. website).

Today I got the SMS that my challan has been sent to court for disposal.

I checked online and it is giving me below status.

*"The  challan is not sent to Virtual Court because payment initiated. So  challan will be disposed in the mentioned regular court."*

Website is showing blank Court Name and Court Address.

How do I pay this off to avoid further trouble?

Location - Noida

​

​

https://preview.redd.it/9r3acp1ylndb1.png?width=2852&format=png&auto=webp&s=5e25de2cdce5192c79bb1b36f06492922b7f989e
comments:
Hi,

Faced the same problem. How did you get it resolved?
Any update on how to solve?
It is showing the same status. Park+ app has the option to settle challan. They are charging 1000 for lawyer. You can settle from there.

Hello, I am in the exact same situation as you were then. Suggest what I can do?
Where to see the court hearing date? Where to pay fine now? I can find these answers anywhere. Please help.
They are charging 1500rs here in Gujarat. Can you elaborate on your experience with the park+ app? Were you required to visit the court?
I have not opted for it
How did you get it resolved?
